title: Jazyk topivce
content:
Jazyk topivce – získáván z těl topivců.

Cena
 Nákup	Prodej
1  	1  




Zdroje
Bahenní stvůry
In Akt II, Shani will give Geralt the bestiary entry for Topivec if he asks her for a monster anatomy lesson after delivering five Vlaštovičník during the Přítelkyně ze starých časů quest. The exchange gives an entry for Jazyk topivce, as well.
Poznámky
Topivec remains will not contain these tongues until you have the Topivec bestiary entry in your journal.
You'll need ten of these for Sigfried in Akt II.
